title: Web Information
description: Information recorded via an `ExperienceEvent` that is specific to the World Wide Web channel, including the web page, referrer and/or link related to the on-page interaction.

xdm:webPageView.title: Web Page View
xdm:webPageView.description: Details about the web page where the web interaction occurred.

xdm:webInteraction.title: Web Interaction
xdm:webInteraction.description: Details about the web link (URL) that corresponds to where the interaction occurred.

xdm:webReferrer.title: Web Referrer
xdm:webReferrer.description: The referrer of a web interaction, which is the URL a visitor came from immediately before the current web interaction was recorded.
